abstract: Total, which was placed under formal investigation on suspicion of bribery and corruption in the oil-for-food program in Iraq, denied wrongdoing.
snippet: Total, which was placed under formal investigation on suspicion of bribery and corruption in the oil-for-food program in Iraq, denied wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — The Paris prosecutor’s office confirmed on Tuesday that Total, the French oil giant, was being investigated in a corruption case linked to its role in the scandal-plagued oil-for-food program in Iraq.

headline.main: Paris Prosecutor Investigating French Oil Firm
headline.print_headline: Paris Prosecutor Investigating French Oil Firm
